name: tryparedoxin:hydroperoxide oxidoreductase
definition: Tryparedoxin + ROOH <=> Tryparedoxin disulfide + H2O + ROH

orthologs.K11185: cytosolic tryparedoxin peroxidase, trypanosomatid typical 2-Cys peroxiredoxin [EC:1.11.1.15]
orthologs.K11186: mitochondrial tryparedoxin peroxidase, trypanosomatid typical 2-Cys peroxiredoxin [EC:1.11.1.15]
